item.title: #17 - Standing Desk
item.description: The Question: What are you having for dinner tonight! The Topic: I stand at thy desk. The Viewermail: The nun wants to become a slut.

item.title: #17 - Standing Desk
item.description: the_question What are you having for dinner tonight! Are you a lonely single mother who anticipates eating a frozen TV dinner meal, while your cat walks all over you and leaves nothing but hair and shame across the facade of your fringe? (if so, give me a call, we should hook up!) With all the fasting I generally only eat dinner, so it’s like the highlight of my day. If you have a partner or A SLAVE, do they cook for you?
